title: Ancient Nutrition Ancient Multi - Women's 40+ Once Daily | The Healthy Place
description: Flourish in every life season with Ancient Nutrition Ancient Multi - Women's 40+ Once Daily, a women's multivitamin & superfood boost!
cleaned_text: Ancient Nutrition Ancient Multi - Women's 40+ Once Daily [Ancient Nutrition](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/brand/ancient-nutrition/) Full Price 1 in stock 30 capsules Ancient Nutrition Ancient Multi - Women's 40+ Once Daily is a convenient one-a-day multivitamin to support vitality and hormone balance for women over 40. - 20 highly absorbable vitamins and minerals* - Herbal formula inspired by traditional Chinese method - Superfoods to support vitality and wellness* - Boosts immune system* - Promotes hormone balance* - Supports women before, during, and after menopause* - Keto, Paleo - Does not contain gluten, dairy, nuts Ancient Nutrition Ancient Multi - Women's 40+ Once Daily As a woman, entering a new life stage can be hard! When 40+ hits you, it can come with many setbacks, including fatigue, reduced mobility, and hormone imbalance. If you're suffering from the effects of menopause or nutrient deficiencies, it's time to get your health back on track! Ancient Nutrition Ancient Multi - Women's 40+ Once Daily are here to help you thrive again.* Ancient Multi - Women's 40+ Once Daily Capsules is the [best women's multivitamin](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/product-category/womens-health/multivitamins-womens-health/) for a full-body, holistic vitality boost after age 40.* Ancient Nutrition stands out by utilizing traditional Chinese herbs to promote hormone balance, longevity, and vitality!* This special blend of time-honored herbs and vitamins and minerals nourishes you from the inside out. Your immune system, bones, skin, brain, and heart will all love these superfoods.* - Bioavailable Nutrients: All nutrients in this unique formula are highly absorbable, whether they are fermented, methylated, or coenzymated. Ancient Nutrition optimizes bioavailability by choosing the best forms of each nutrient.* - Ancient Chinese Herbs: The ancient, tried-and-true practices of traditional Chinese medicine promote specific, potent herbs for women's wellness during and after menopause. Herbs like chaste tree berry, schisandra berry, ginkgo, and Dong Quai encourage healthy progesterone and estrogen levels, and support energy, longevity and vitality.* - Bovine Liver: From B vitamins to iron and zinc, liver has been a dietary staple in many cultures for centuries.* Renowned for its potent vitamin and mineral content, liver is a nutrient powerhouse! - Wild Hake Immune-Boosting Nutrition: Ancient Multi-Women's reishi mushrooms, licorice root, and goji berries to boost immunity and support a healthy stress response with antioxidants.* Ancient Multi - Women's 40+ Once Daily are one of the best [women's multivitamins](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/product-category/womens-health/multivitamins-womens-health/) to replenish nutrients and get ahead of pre- and post-menopausal symptoms.* With the right tools, you can enjoy healthy bones, functional joints, and flourishing energy for years to come!* Ancient Nutrition Ancient Multi - Women's 40+ Once Daily are convenient, streamlined capsules. If fewer capsules a day appeals to you, this is the product for you. If you need help choosing the right [multivitamin for women](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/product-category/womens-health/multivitamins-womens-health/), one of our certified Wellness Consultants would be happy to assist you! Suggested Use: Adults take 1 capsule per day with 8 oz of water or your favorite beverage. Can be taken with or without food. Cautions: Keep out of the reach of children. Consult a physician before taking this product if you are pregnant, nursing, taking any medications, or have a medical condition. Accidental overdose of iron-containing products is a leading cause of fatal poisoning in children under 6. In case of accidental overdose, call a doctor or poison control center immediately Questions? We've got answers! Click the LiveChat button in the lower right hand side of your screen to start talking with one of our Wellness Consultants or [ call one of our stores](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/contact/) to speak with a member of our team. Serving Size: 1 Capsule Servings Per Container: 30 Ingredients: Vitamin A (as beta-carotene), Vitamin C, Vitamin D, Vitamin E (as d-alpha tocopherol succinate), Vitamin K Vitamin (as Biotin, Organic Root Extract, Organic Chinese Yam Root Extract, Organic Schisandra Berry Extract, Chicken Bone Broth, Beef Bone Broth, Organic Lycium Berry Extract, Organic Chastetree Berry Extract, Organic Licorice Root Extract, Organic Ginkgo Leaf Extract, Organic Reishi Mushroom Extract, Wild Hake Roe. Other Ingredients: Saccharomyces cerevisiae, gelatin Ancient Nutrition creates whole-food nutritional products that are designed to power body and mind and restore us to health, strength, and vitality. Ancient Nutrition is founded and run by Jordan Rubin, one of America's most-recognized and respected natural health experts, and well as Dr. Josh Axe, who operates one of the worlds' largest natural health websites. These products are powered by ancient principles, and are created using the wisdom of Ayurveda and Traditional Chinese Herbalism that has survived generations. These methods are combined with modern research to create supplements that are rooted in traditional knowledge - and supported by science.
